name: Sealed Fortress Demo
description:
SEALED FORTRESS [demo]

The Lady of the Red Mask's precious fallen star has been missing for half a decade now. Its location has always been known, but no one has managed to breach the powerful seal keeping it inside the last fortress of the bygone Velithian empire.

That is, until now.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Sealed Fortress is a dungeon-crawling RPG in which you take a party of 3 through the treacherous halls of a castle corrupted by wild magic. 

Facing dangerous monsters, finding treasure and sharing soup together are all part of the adventure!

- Low numbers, tense battle system 

- Unlock abilities by equipping gear found in the dungeon

- Exploration and resource management is key

- Soup

Around 3 hours estimated playtime

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
